directions: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir the garlic and onion in the oil until translucent; scrape the mixture onto a plate, and place in the refrigerator to cooled to room temperature. Once cooled, stir the feta cheese into the garlic and onion mixture.
Arrange the beets on a serving plate; top with garlic, onion, and feta cheese mixture; season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) cans sliced beets, drained and diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Goddess Beet Salad
